project_abstract.cdata: The Forestry Project will accelerate afforestation and improve management and exploitation of existing forests on 92 state forest farms in Guangdong, Heilongjiang and Sichuan Provinces. The project will establish about 82,000 ha of forest plantations, introduce forest improvement measures on existing young plantations and natural forests, construct and upgrade about 1,900 km of forest roads and tracks, and expand equipment and vehicle fleets. It will provide for the construction of about l57,000 sq m of buildings and 1,100 km of utility lines and the establishment of wood processing facilities. The project will strengthen forest research facilities in four provinces and establish extension centers in ten provinces. A technical assistance component will provide overseas training opportunities (533 man-months) in logging, forest road construction and forest production, research and extension; and consulting services (34 man-months) in forestry research and extension, and soil science. At full development the project will produce annually about 546,000 cubic meters of roundwood, and 10,000 cubic meters of plywood and other miscellaneous wood products to meet strong internal demand.

P003430.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>林业开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将促进广东、黑龙江和四川三省92家国营林场的造林工作，加强对现有森林的管理和开发利用。项目将营造约8.2万公顷人工林，引入针对现有人工苗木林和天然林的改造措施，建设并升级改造约1900公里林区公路和小道，增加设备和车辆数量。项目将资助建设约15.7万平方米建筑，架设1100公里电线和通信线路，建设木材加工设施。项目将加强四省森林研究机构的能力，在10省建立技术推广中心。技术援助子项目将提供国际培训机会，包括森林砍伐、林区公路建设和森林生产、研究以及技术推广方面的培训，同时在林业研究和技术推广以及土壤学方面提供咨询服务（34个人月）。项目全面铺开后，每年将生产约54.6万方圆木、1万方板材和其它多种木材产品，从而满足国内强劲的木材需求。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
